      public boolean test​(StringBuilder buffer, Selection selection) throws IllegalArgumentException, NullPointerException
      Test if the constructor parameters are good.
      Parameters:
      buffer - the buffer of the engine
      selection - the selection of the engine
      Returns:
      true if the parameters are good and error if not.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the buffer don't match.
      NullPointerException - if the buffer or the selection are null
